there is a way to get past the whole disk unreadable deal. just install the game on your HD clear your cache go play game wait for black screen count to three and press the eject button twice really quickly so the drive doesnt actually open and it will ask you to update and play but everytime you want to play you have to clear the cache and do the quick eject trick but it works for my fable THANK GOODNESS!
